titles.title: Schizophrenia is a puzzle-platformer game about logic, perception, WW2, cloning, quantum mechanics, philosophy, cats with hats, beautiful women, ethics, Sweden, trains, burning snow-helicopters, failing hard drives and a small boy trying to figure it out. Well actually only the cloning part is true.
